22086bed-402e-4b6d-84a7-9bc9a8dba45b.description: Co-created with Hult International Business School, the EY Tech MBA by Hult is a virtual corporate Master of Business Administration (MBA) - available to all EY people and focused on developing the mindset and skillset to navigate new ways of working. Badge earners will be able to customize their curriculum from a broad range of subject areas, from general management to AI, blockchain and RPA to employee wellbeing, diversity and inclusion and sustainable business practices.
22086bed-402e-4b6d-84a7-9bc9a8dba45b.name: EY Tech MBA by Hult (2022)

issuer.summary: issued by Hult International Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Complete over 1500 hours of learning and experience
Demonstrate advanced levels of understanding of all pillars Technology, Business and Leadership through internal/external conversations
Share knowledge through thought leadership, coaching, conferences, social media, client presentations or other relevant channels

Please note that EY makes certain disclaimers relating to the award of this badge, the relevant individual's qualifications and/or EY member firm services as set out on EY's website. ( http://www.ey.com/gl/en/home/ey-badges-disclaimer )

68e7cdba-4370-42cd-911a-001cc4433609.description: Co-created with Hult International Business School, the EY Masters in Business Analytics specialist degree develops skills in cutting-edge technologies required to transform EY & client businesses. Learners customize their curriculum from a range of EY Badges in data, AI, technology, leadership & business. Learners take part in the EY Better Working World AI Challenge - developing solutions to real-world problems that help create long-term value for society, the planet and businesses.
68e7cdba-4370-42cd-911a-001cc4433609.name: EY Masters in Business Analytics by Hult (2022)

issuer.summary: issued by Hult International Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Complete over 1500 hours of learning and experience
Demonstrate advanced levels of knowledge and experience in the fields of core data, artificial intelligence, technology, leadership and business.
Share knowledge through thought leadership, coaching, meetings, conferences, social media, client work, internal projects, and other relevant channels

Please note that EY makes certain disclaimers relating to the award of this badge, the relevant individual's qualifications and/or EY member firm services as set out on EY's website. ( http://www.ey.com/gl/en/home/ey-badges-disclaimer )

f11e4b64-5d6b-4dd4-80f8-356ec91b9435.description: Co-created with Hult International Business School, the EY Masters in Sustainability is a specialist degree that explores the environmental, social, governance and economic risks and opportunities of sustainable business practices. Learners are equipped with practical knowledge through EY Sustainability, Business and Leadership Badges to drive innovative, sustainable practices across organizations. Learners develop solutions to real-world problems through the Creating Long-term Value Grand Chall
f11e4b64-5d6b-4dd4-80f8-356ec91b9435.name: EY Masters in Sustainability by Hult (2023)

issuer.summary: issued by Hult International Business School

badge_template_activities.title: Complete over 900 hours of learning and experience.

Demonstrate advanced levels of knowledge and experience in the fields of sustainable finance, strategy, circular economy, responsible & inclusive business practices, climate change, change management and marketing.
Share knowledge through thought leadership, coaching, meetings, conferences, social media, client work, internal projects and other relevant channels.
